title: Recall.Photos
description:
📸 Drowning in photos? This app lets you search & chat with your image folders using LLMs — all locally.
🗂️ Just select a folder, spin up Ollama, and it processes your images (only needed once).
💬 Then ask: “sunset at the beach” or “photos with my dog”
🔒 100% offline. No cloud. No signup. Your photos stay yours.
⚙️ No Ollama? No problem — it can fall back to running in-browser models.

I was looking for such a tool online but couldn't find it, so I built it. Please share your feedback!
